mode_details

setAboutInfo

Function

Structure

Shell.Project

Type

val setAboutInfo about_details -> unit

Syntax

setAboutInfo details -> ()

Arguments

details
A value of type about_details.

Values

()

Description

This function sets the about details of the current project equal to details.
